To learn how we can move beyond our denial, our pursuit of our own interests at the expense of the rest of the world, our fear of what the future will bring, consider reading The Great Waves of Change by Marshall Vian Summers. 
"The first great challenge facing you is to face the great challenge--without insisting upon solutions, without fighting against the truth of what you know and what you see, without blaming other people or expecting someone else to take care of the problem for you. Everyone must take responsibility in how they live, how they think, in what they do, in the decisions before them today and in the decisions that they will have to face in the future.... It is certainly not a time to be ambivalent or complacent...Therefore you stand at the precipice. Will you choose to remain ignorant and in denial...or will you choose the path of courage and wisdom to prepare and to allow God's great gift of Knowledge to guide you and to direct you now?"
